alert.note: Alert for Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 8:12PM MDT until July 06 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 811 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles north of Haswell, or 42 miles south of Flagler, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Eads. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM MDT for southeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
